b'Rebirth Moon Divergence': b'Ires and his father, Leglight are peddlers. Near Gramnoa,they met a genius "tempest", Yuan. Yuan thinks they are bandits, and began to fight. Leglight wields his mystic weapon, and beats him back. However, right after that, he is swallowed into black light leaving the weapon, a "device", and a message, \xe2\x80\x9cVisit Oldman in Gramnoa\xe2\x80\x9d. To look for his father, he leaves for Gramnoa. \n\n(Source: Animenfo)'
